data.title: Contact
data.meta_description: Please send a message using this form. We will get back to you as soon as possible.
data.text:
I accept the privacy policy and legal notice. *

Privacy Policy

If you click on button to send, the personal data you have provided will be used to communicate with you and keep you informed about IGTP activities. Your personal data will be processed according to the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR 2016/679). Your data will be incorporated into the Germans Trias i Pujol Health Sciences Research Institute Foundation database, which is located within the European Economic Area.

Data Subjects have the right to ask the data controller for access, rectification, erasure, limitation and objection to the processing of their personal data, as well as the right to data portability. If you want to exercise any of the rights listed above, please write to dpd@ticsalutsocial.cat
